text: Fanshi ba ziji de qizi cheng wei ziji de muqin [xiang liqi tamen], ranhou xiang shouhui ziji suo shuo zhi hua de ren,[qi chufa shi]: Zai ta lia fang shiqian, xu shifang yige nuli. Zhe shi yong lai quangao nimen de [gu nimen buyao gan zhe zhong chunshi]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
